name: emerson-violin-pwa
description: Emerson Violin Studio command center PWA (offline-first practice cockpit)

scripts.predev: node scripts/maintenance/prune-legacy.js && node scripts/build/copy-sqlite-wasm.js && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js && mkdir -p dist/.stage
scripts.predev:threads: node scripts/maintenance/prune-legacy.js && node scripts/build/copy-sqlite-wasm.js && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js && mkdir -p dist/.stage
scripts.dev:threads: NO_COLOR=false RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" trunk serve --features wasm-threads --port 5173
scripts.prebuild: node scripts/maintenance/prune-legacy.js && node scripts/build/copy-sqlite-wasm.js && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js && mkdir -p dist-build/.stage
scripts.prebuild:threads: node scripts/maintenance/prune-legacy.js && node scripts/build/copy-sqlite-wasm.js && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js && mkdir -p dist-build/.stage
scripts.build:threads: NO_COLOR=false RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=nightly RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" trunk build --features wasm-threads --release --dist dist-build
scripts.postbuild: node scripts/build/optimize-wasm.js --dist dist-build && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js --dist --dist-dir dist-build && node scripts/build/promote-dist.js --src dist-build --dest dist
scripts.prepreview: node scripts/maintenance/prune-legacy.js && node scripts/build/copy-sqlite-wasm.js && node scripts/build/build-sw-assets.js && mkdir -p dist/.stage
